com.citytechinc.cq.component.annotations

Annotation Type HtmlTag


  • public @interface HtmlTag
    Represents the cq:htmlTag node which will be rendered as a direct child of the component's defining node. The attributes on this node give you some level of control over the DOM element with which AEM wraps your component instance when decoration is not disabled.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String cssClass
      The CSS Class to apply to the component wrapper.
      String id
      The ID to apply to the component wrapper.
      String tagName
      The DOM element type to be used when wrapping the component

    • Element Detail

      • tagName

        public abstract String tagName
        The DOM element type to be used when wrapping the component
        Returns:
        The DOM element type to be used when wrapping the component. Defaults to div
        Default:
        "div"

      • cssClass

        public abstract String cssClass
        The CSS Class to apply to the component wrapper. This will override the classes applied by the wrapping mechanism but will be rendered in addition to the cell name of the component.
        Returns:
        The CSS Class to apply to the component wrapper
        Default:
        ""

      • id

        public abstract String id
        The ID to apply to the component wrapper.
        Returns:
        The ID to apply to the component wrapper
        Default:
        ""
